name: Elder Kings II
summary: Total conversion mod to Crusader Kings 3 that transforms medieval Afro-Eurasia into the Elder Scrolls' Tamriel. A followup to the Elder Kings mod of Crusader Kings 2 which adapts Crusader Kings 3's engine and granular religion/culture mechanics to represent well known and obscure groups struggling for safety or supremacy in the Tamriel of the 2nd Era.
